backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with data types, maps, IDs, default gallery items, access control, and query methods for user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that mirrors actor state types and returns the previous state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies feature evidence for adding image file upload support in the gallery admin UI, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, font preloads, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and renders the app using SiteLayout as the root component.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form component using react-hook-form to submit contact messages via a mutateAsync call with success and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/forms/Membership: Membership registration form handling user details and membership type submission with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Lightbox dialog for navigating gallery images with keyboard and on-screen controls.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays payment option cards for maintenance fees and welfare contributions with placeholder buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing association details, quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive navigation header with desktop links and a mobile sheet menu highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and Outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating notices, events, gallery items, contact info, admin status, and user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus custom OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and utility classes for NCRL brand colors.
frontend/src/lib/events.ts: Maps EventType values to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/gallery.ts: Provides helpers to normalize, validate, sort, and fallback gallery items, including default local items.
frontend/src/lib/notices.ts: Maps NoticeCategory values to descriptive category labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, committee info, and styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with authentication, profile setup, and CRUD interfaces for notices, events, and gallery items.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays association contact info with loading skeletons and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays upcoming and past events with type labels and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery with loading/error states and opens a lightbox for selected images using fetched gallery items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, quick links, previews for notices/events/gallery, and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPaymentsPag: Provides membership registration and payments UI using a form and payments section inside styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Shows notices filtered by category with tabs, loading states, and cards for each notice.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, pending requests, admin access issues, and architectural notes.
